original_text:
that you turn your spirit against God
    and bring such words out of your mouth?
korean_text: 네 영이 하나님께 분노를 터뜨리며 네 입을 놀리느냐

sentences.original_text: that you turn your spirit against God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 마음을 하나님께 거슬러 돌리는 것

sentences.original_text: and bring such words out of your mouth?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 입에서 그런 말을 내는 것?
